DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Malnutrition and/or Sarcopenia at Hospital Admission
DOC.detailed_description: The primary outcome of this study is to determine the prevalence of malnutrition and/or sarcopenia at admission to the hospital in older adults. The secondary outcome is to assess the relationship between malnutrition/sarcopenia status and length of stay, comorbidity load, polypharmacy, and 30-day readmission.
DOC.criteria: Admitted to the UTMB ACE unit Aged 65 years or older Able to consent to participate in study (alert and oriented x3) Because this study aims to determine prevalence of malnutrition and/or sarcopenia at admission to the hospital, patients will be excluded if study measures are not able to be taken within 72 hours of admission.
